00031         {
00032                 m_title = title;

00051         void SetTitleLocation(int location)
00052         {
00053                 if (m_titleLocation != location) {
00054                         m_titleLocation = location;
00055                         FireAxisChanged();
00056                 }
00057         }
00058

00065                 return m_titleLocation;
00066         }

00075                 FireAxisChanged();
